wikipedia_page.main: Robert Parker  (born 4 December 1987, Cheltenham) is a British water polo player. At the 2012 Summer Olympics, he competed for the Great Britain men's national water polo team in the men's event. He is 6 ft 6 inches tall. He was the top goal scorer for Team GB with 8 goals in the London Olympics.
